data.title: Programs and Services Directory
data.text:
Job Development Investment Grant (JDIG)

PROGRAM | Qualify for direct cash grants to your business when you create jobs or invest in North Carolina in competitive situations. Companies must meet strict performance targets, but JDIG grants can significantly help offset the cost of locating or expanding here.

Agriculture Sites | Gas Products Fund

PROGRAM | Obtain a grant to facilitate new and expanded natural gas and propane gas service in order to expand agricultural production or processing capabilities.

Building Demolition: Federal - CDBG Grants

PROGRAM | Clear off old buildings from promising industrial sites with these grants from federal Community Development Block Grant funds.

Building Demolition: State - Rural Grants

PROGRAM | Clear off old buildings from promising industrial sites with these grants funded from state resources.

Building Reuse: Federal - CDBG Grants

PROGRAM | Renovate old or vacant buildings to attract new or expanding businesses. Money is granted to local governments from federal Community Development Block Grant funds.

Building Reuse: State - Rural Grants

PROGRAM | Renovate and reuse old or vacant buildings to attract new or expanding businesses. Money from this state-funded program is granted to local governments.

Business Search

SERVICE (Online) | Search for businesses located in North Carolina with our directory and business search tool.

Certified Sites

PROGRAM | Streamline your search for a shovel-ready industrial site by selecting a North Carolina Certified Site, a location that has met significant and documented prerequisites for development.

County & Regional Profiles

SERVICE | Review summaries of economic, demographic, and community data to better understand the business environment and quality of life in North Carolinaâ€™s counties and regions.

Customized Career Services for Agriculture Workers

SERVICE | Find employment in agriculture settings with our personalized assistance for agricultural workers

Customized Career Services for Former Offenders

SERVICE | Find support for your reentry with personalized job-search services from our NCWorks reentry specialists
